>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/2.0/files/rooms/{id}/links"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns the links of the room with the ID specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"id","in":"path","description":"The room ID.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":9846}},{"name":"type","in":"query","description":"The link type.","schema":{"oneOf":[{"enum":["Invitation","External"],"type":"string","description":"[Invitation - Invitation, External - External]","example":"Invitation"},{"enum":[0,1],"type":"integer","description":"[0 - Invitation, 1 - External]","example":0,"x-enum-varnames":["Invitation","External"],"x-enum-descriptions":["Invitation","External"]}],"description":"Defines the types of the sharing links.","title":"LinkType"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
